title: Patching incredibly slow.
body: League is patching at anywhere from 140-200 kbp/s where I normally download at 15+ mbp/s. Problem is exclusive to League. Any solutions?

replies.body: I'm having the same issue. No idea why.

Updating game files can vary for each PC, including factors like your network as well as your hard drive.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection just in case there's some slow down to the patching servers.  Hopefully everything is okay now!
